Plot: Two neighbors have it out after one of them decorates his house for the holidays so brightly that it can be seen from space.
Title: Deck the Halls
Writer: Matt Corman, Chris Ord, Don Rhymer
Actors: Danny DeVito, Matthew Broderick, Kristin Davis, Kristin Chenoweth
tomatoConsensus: Relying on flat humor and a preposterous plot, Deck the Halls is an unnecessarily mean-spirited holiday movie that does little to put viewers in a holiday mood.
